attributes.action: Parents & carers should wear face coverings at school drop off and pickup
attributes.additional_details: Give clear guidance that parents and carers should wear a face covering on school drop off and pick up
attributes.background:
We need to take collective responsibility to protect the closure of our schools, the education of our children, and the health of our communities. 
Face coverings could prevent the unnecessary spread of COVID-19.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550896
